settings.hint: Tab detail setting window can be displayed, added, deleted, and reordered by dragging.

unreadCount.name: Unread mark shows the number of unread messages
unreadCount.hint: ONï¼š show the number of unread messages.  OFF: show a simple dot only.

showAlonemessageToDefaultTab.name: Show Orphaned Messages in Default Tab
showAlonemessageToDefaultTab.hint: ON; Displays messages (e.g., messages without this mnodule, deleted tab's messages) in the default tab. OFF: these messages can read in tab with Show All Messages option.

tooltips.edit: Edit detail settings for this tab
tooltips.defaultTab: The default tab cannot be reordered.

detailSettings.label: Tab Name

showAllMessages.label: Show All Messages
showAllMessages.hint: ON: Show all messages regardless of settings in other tabs.

forceOOC.label: Force Out-of-Character (OOC)
forceOOC.hint: ON: Force new messages to Out-of-Character (OOC) in this tab.

detailSettings.forceDisplayHint: Force display setting by messages type

tooltips.moveDisabled: Unavailable as 'Display in This Tab Only' is set on the '{tabName}' tab.

forceOptions.duplicate: Display in Active Tab and This Tab

reset.title: Reset Tab Settings
reset.content: Do you want to reset all tab settings to their default state? (All messages will be detached from tabs and become invisible.)

delete.title: Delete Tab
delete.content: Do you want to delete the tab '{name}'?

notifications.cannotDeleteDefault: The default tab cannot be deleted.
notifications.cannotDragDefault: The default tab cannot be reordered.
